name: The Ark Christian Preschool
description: The Ark Christian Preschool is a private Christian preschool dedicated to the purpose of providing a loving, caring, safe, and nurturing environment for all children. The curriculum and programming includes language development, reading readiness, math readiness, health studies, social studies, perceptual development, fine and gross motor development, music appreciation, science exploration, and Bible lessons with personal application. They also include Chinese and Spanish language/ethnic studie
